id: With Kavanaugh on Supreme Court, Lawyers Shift Strategies
paragraph:
November 15, 2018The U.S. Supreme Court is expected to hear a case next year about whether the Constitution permits a 40-foot cross honoring World War I veterans on a traffic island in Bladensburg, Md.Lawyers seeking to preserve the war memorial appealed the case to the high court months ago.But after Justice Brett Kavanaugh’s confirmation, the lawyers began...
